title: OnePlus 8 series and OnePlus 9R receive new OxygenOS 12 stable build with bug fixes and improvements
content:
Last month, OnePlus finally released a stable OxygenOS 12 update based on Android 12 to the OnePlus 8 series and OnePlus 9R. The company is now following up with a new software update that fixes some bugs present in the initial release. OnePlus has started rolling out a new OxygenOS update to the OnePlus 8,

The post OnePlus 8 series and OnePlus 9R receive new OxygenOS 12 stable build with bug fixes and improvements appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The OnePlus 8, OnePlus 8 Pro, OnePlus 8T and OnePlus 9R are receiving a new OxygenOS 12-based update with March 2022 security patches and bug fixes.
